subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Baseball
Yankee Stadium (NYC)
lead_paragraph: It was 1948 when Paul Simon suddenly realized he was a Yankee fan. Sixty years later, he reminisces about his experiences at Yankee Stadium.
snippet: It was 1948 when Paul Simon suddenly realized he was a Yankee fan. Sixty years later, he reminisces about his experiences at Yankee Stadium.
